# PED::SET_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_ORIGIN

## Summary
Changes the root position and orientation of an existing synchronized scene

## Parameters
* **INT** sceneID: The scene index returned by CREATE_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE scenePosition - the position of the scene root in world coordinates sceneOrientation - The orientation of the scene root in world coordinates
* **FLOAT** scenePositionX
* **FLOAT** scenePositionY
* **FLOAT** scenePositionZ
* **FLOAT** sceneOrientationX
* **FLOAT** sceneOrientationY
* **FLOAT** sceneOrientationZ
* **EULER_ROT_ORDER** rotOrder = 2

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Use this command to change a synchronised scene's origin after it has been created
